description:
Comfort, performance, and a classic fit—their men's Vaha E-Waist Pant is the versatile style you crave. Famous among fans thanks to its lightweight texture, oh-so relaxed feel, and the bacteria-resistant performance of hemp, their bestselling Vaha collection is the ultimate do-everything wear.

The casual vibe of this pant makes it great for in and out of the yoga studio, and its upscale look means you can wear it around town without feeling underdressed. Add this style to your wardrobe and they think you'll quickly see what all the excitement is about.
name: Prana Vaha E-Waist Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
